description: Non material amendment of planning permission ref: P2013/3202/FUL to alter the ground floor layout, the provision of ventilation louvres to the Crinan Street and York  Way elevations, and the incorporation of a door to serve a repositioned electricity substation.
decision_conditions:
Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved this consent gives no permission for alterations to the plant enclosure(s) at roof level. Condition 4 of planning permission P2013/3202/FUL still applies, and details of the plant enclosure(s) at roof level should be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to any superstructure works commencing on site. 

REASON:  In the interest of good design and also to ensure that the Authority may be satisfied that any roof-top plant, ancillary enclosure/structure and/or the lift overruns do not have a harmful impact on the surrounding streetscene.
